articles.author: Stephen Johnson
articles.title: The Out-of-Touch Adults' Guide To Kid Culture: Could We Really Colonize Venus?
articles.description: I’ve tested the global youth-culture internet and the results have come back positive: Everything is looking up this week. We’re even talking about colonizing Venus, which is cool...if not impossible. Read more...
